Package com.webfirmframework.wffweb.css.css3

Class WebkitBackgroundSize

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.webfirmframework.wffweb.css.core.AbstractCssProperty<WebkitBackgroundSize>
      • com.webfirmframework.wffweb.css.css3.WebkitBackgroundSize
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CssProperty, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
    public class WebkitBackgroundSize
extends AbstractCssProperty<WebkitBackgroundSize>
     background-size: auto|length|cover|contain|initial|inherit;

 The background-size property specifies the size of the background images.
 Default value:  auto
 Inherited:      no
 Animatable:     yes
 Version:        CSS3
 JavaScript syntax:      object.style.webkitBackgroundSize="60px 120px"
    Since:
    1.0.0
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
